nodes.text: The People's Tower was a building located in the city of New Adasta on the planet Ziost. It was styled after the Imperial Citadel on Dromund Kaas. During the Invasion of Ziost, Lana Beniko and Theron Shan used the Tower's systems to generate a massive electrostatic blast, freeing New Adasta's populace from Vitiate's control—though only for a short time.
